title: Not getting icon after 34 points in Pick'Em?
body:
I havent gotten my icon for getting 34 points in pick'em.. any idea why?
https://gyazo.com/0beff3e79ddc62a4ad167e934780bbd4
https://gyazo.com/28596f3ae037d812da03243c7c184bc4

{{sticker:sg-ahri-1}}

replies.body: I have 35 points as well, still no icon.

I had to double check, but this account does have the Pick 'em Poro Icon already. Be sure to check your icons for this one!

https://i.gyazo.com/47004d98bab444578449c7eb155ad4af.png

this is the first poro icon. THe other one for the 34 points is not being completed even though i have 35 points.

http://prntscr.com/gzzvjz this is the one we are talking about

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=jEc2OGmf,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-10-20T00:35:49.518+0000)
>
> I had to double check, but this account does have the Pick 'em Poro Icon already. Be sure to check your icons for this one!
> 
> https://i.gyazo.com/47004d98bab444578449c7eb155ad4af.png

That is not the Pick'em Poro icon though. [](http://cdn.garenanow.com/community/esports/001-LeagueofLegends/2017-Worlds/LOBBY/Pick%20Em'/34PointsPoro.png) This one is. (btw. I'm having the same issue)
